押.definition: to mortgage; to pawn; to detain in custody; to escort and protect; (literary) to sign

押寶.definition: to play yabao (a gambling game); (fig.) to gamble on; to take one's chance; to try one's luck

押平聲韻.definition: to restrict to even tone (i.e. final rhyming syllable must be classical first or second tone 平聲|平声)

押沙龍.definition: Absalom, third son of David, king of Israel (Old Testament)

押解.definition: to send away under escort (criminals, goods etc)

押車.definition: to escort (goods) during transportation; to delay unloading (a truck, train etc)

押送.definition: to send under escort; to transport a detainee

押運.definition: to escort (goods or funds); to convey under guard

押運員.definition: supercargo (in maritime law); agent responsible for goods; an escort

押韻.definition: to rhyme; sometimes written 壓韻|压韵

押題.definition: (in one's study) to focus on the topics one speculates will appear on the exam
